alert.note: Alert for Elkhead and Park Mountains; Flat Tops (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 02 at 2:26PM MST until January 04 at 6:00AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches this afternoon. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected through Wednesday morning with new snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. * WHERE...Elkhead and Park Mountains and Flat Tops. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 6 PM MST this evening. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 6 PM this evening to 6 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on icy to snowpacked road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow continues beyond this evening, however heavier snowfall rates become more localized to higher elevations and lessen Tuesday through Tuesday night.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Elkhead and Park Mountains; Flat Tops
